edu.umich.auth.cosign.pool
Class CosignConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.umich.auth.cosign.pool.CosignConnectionManager
public class CosignConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages all the activities related to a Cosign connection.

htchan

java.util.TreeMap strategyMap

Constructor Detail

CosignConnectionManager

private CosignConnectionManager()
Constructor for ConnectionManager. It starts the monitor threads for the Cosign configuation file and the Cosign connection pools.

Method Detail

getConnection

public CosignConnection getConnection(java.lang.String cookie)
This method returns a Cosign connection. It uses an existing Cosign connection strategy specific to the cookie or creates one if it does not exist.

Parameters:
cookie -
Returns:

returnConnection

public void returnConnection(CosignConnection cc)
This method returns the Cosign connection back to the pool.

Parameters:
cc - The Cosign connection.

cleanUpStrategy

public void cleanUpStrategy(java.lang.String cookie)
This method removes the CosignConnectionStrategy object related to a Cosign service cookie after it is done from the strategyMap.

Parameters:
cookie -

                 throws java.lang.Throwable
